mapper.select: SELECT i_idx, m_idx, inquiry_type, writer, phone, title, content, password, status, reg_date, update_date FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, i_idx, m_idx, inquiry_type, writer, phone, title, content, password, status, reg_date, update_date FROM (SELECT * FROM inquiry_board ORDER BY i_idx desc) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ORDER BY i_idx desc) WHERE rn > ( #{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry_board(i_idx, m_idx, inquiry_type, writer, content, password, status, reg_date, phone, title) VALUES(SEQ_INQUIRY.nextval, #{m_idx }, #{inquiry_type }, #{writer }, #{content }, #{password }, #{status }, sysdate, #{phone }, #{title })
